sentence.Network_en: Amy woke up to the sound of her doorbell ringing.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着门铃叮当作响，埃米醒来了。

sentence.Network_en: Oh dear, there's the doorbell. See who it is, would you, darling.
sentence.Network_cn: 哦，天哪，门铃响了。看看是谁好吗，亲爱的。

sentence.Network_en: Nancy was lacing her shoe up when the doorbell rang.
sentence.Network_cn: 门铃响时南希正在系鞋带。

entry.def: A doorbell is a bell on the outside of a house which you can ring so that the people inside know that you want to see them.

means.word_mean: 1. a push button at an outer door that gives a ringing or buzzing signal when pushed

auth_sentence.content: Downstairs the doorbell gave out its jaunty chimes.

sentences.en: He refused to answer the doorbell.
sentences.cn: 门铃响了，但他拒绝去开门。

sentences.en: I heard the doorbell ring, and went to see who was there.
sentences.cn: 我听见门铃响，就去看谁来了。
